title: void Arc ( Magnetic therapy ring )
description: Slip into serenity with the Void Arc, a minimalist magnetic therapy ring engineered to balance energy, reduce stress, and promote overall well-being. Crafted with precision and powered by dual-pole magnetic nodes, this sleek band isn’t just a statement piece—it’s wellness at your fingertips.

title: Eternal Cipher – Celtic Edition
description: Unlock the ancient code of timeless design. The Eternal Cipher – Celtic Edition is a symbolic fusion of mysticism and craftsmanship, inspired by sacred Celtic knots that echo infinity, unity, and the flow of life.

title: Leather Recliner Sofa
description: Luxury leather recliner with plush cushions for ultimate comfort.

title: Study Desk with Drawers
description: Compact desk with storage space, ideal for study or home office.

title: LED Floor Lamp
description: Tall LED lamp with adjustable brightness and color modes.

title: 3-Piece Wall Art Set
description: Abstract canvas artwork — perfect for modern interiors.

title: Minimalist Bookshelf
description: Open-design bookshelf for storage and display.

title: Metal Wall Clock
description: Large industrial-style wall clock with a silent mechanism.

title: Foldable Laptop Table
description: Portable table for bed or sofa, with cup holder and drawer.
